content: includes instructions for a crochet easter basket pattern including a pattern for crochet easter eggs and a crochet easter egg bunny pattern - this is an instant download - pdf pattern- ***please note that these patterns are available for free on my blog http //www crochet365knittoo com/crochet-easter-eggs/ the benefit of purchasing this pdf is an easy to read printable and ad-free version of the pattern *** materials needed - worsted weight yarn exact brand and color provided - crochet hook size h and j - stuffing embroidery floss small buttons pipe cleaners optional - tapestry needle for weaving in ends sewing needle and thread basket is approx 9 tall including the handle 4 tall excluding the handle the diameter of the bag is approx 6 5 each egg is approximately 2 75 tall bunny egg is about 4 5 tall from tip of ear to bottom of egg pattern is written in english using standard american terms level advanced beginner this listing is for a pdf pattern instant download not a finished product please make sure to download adobe reader at www adobe com if you do not already have it on your computer copyright ©2018 crochet 365 knit too do not reproduce sell or copy this pattern in any way you may however sell finished products due to the nature of the product there will be no refunds after purchase
